_comment: This JSON file contains parameters for the SNU668 rK Selection Experiments. Modify values as needed.

database._comment: Database connection queries for retrieving passaging and media data. Update these if your data source changes.

queries.passaging_query: SELECT id, cellLine, event, passaged_from_id1, passage, date, correctedCount, cellCount, areaOccupied_um2, cellSize_um2, media FROM Passaging

filters._comment: Define filter ranges for seeding lineages. Specify 'first' and 'last' seed IDs along with grouping labels.

plotting._comment: Plotting configuration. Update the options below to customize plot appearance, including colors, titles, axis labels, and faceting. Also set the output path for saving the plot.

titles._comment: Define titles for different experimental conditions. These will appear on the plots.

axis_labels._comment: Axis labels for the plots. Update these to change the x-axis and y-axis labels.

facet_grid._comment: Faceting options for splitting plots. 'rows' and 'cols' determine the grid layout, while 'scales' sets axis scaling behavior.

database_settings._comment: Database settings. Set disconnect_on_completion to true to close the database connection after processing.
